title: Welcome to Claude-Flow + TaskMaster Extension
description: This project is now compatible with the VS Code TaskMaster extension!

subtasks.title: Install the claude-task-master VS Code extension
subtasks.description: Search for "claude-task-master" in VS Code extensions

subtasks.title: Explore visual task management features
subtasks.description: Use the TaskMaster sidebar to manage your tasks visually

subtasks.title: Try SPARC methodology integration
subtasks.description: Tasks are automatically enhanced with SPARC phases and agent assignments
